languages.text: "О том, кто является преступником в глазах Арбитес, оставьте судить мне. Что касается моего присутствия здесь — просто напоминаю вам, как звучит Лекс Империалис, и как выглядят зубы Глейто".

"I will be the judge of who is a criminal in the eyes of the Adeptus Arbites. As for my presence here — that's just to give you a reminder of the sound of the Lex Imperialis and the sight of Glaito's teeth."
languages.original_text: "О том, кто является преступником в глазах Арбитес, оставьте судить мне. Что касается моего присутствия здесь — просто напоминаю вам, как звучит Лекс Империалис, и как выглядят зубы Глейто".

traits.locale_text: "I will be the judge of who is a criminal in the eyes of the Adeptus Arbites. As for my presence here — that's just to give you a reminder of the sound of the Lex Imperialis and the sight of Glaito's teeth."

"I will be the judge of who is a criminal in the eyes of the Adeptus Arbites. As for my presence here — that's just to give you a reminder of the sound of the Lex Imperialis and the sight of Glaito's teeth."

"I will be the judge of who is a criminal in the eyes of the Adeptus Arbites. As for my presence here — that's just to give you a reminder of the sound of the Lex Imperialis and the sight of Glaito's teeth."

"I will be the judge of who is a criminal in the eyes of the Adeptus Arbites. As for my presence here — that's just to give you a reminder of the sound of the Lex Imperialis and the sight of Glaito's teeth."

"I will be the judge of who is a criminal in the eyes of the Adeptus Arbites. As for my presence here — that's just to give you a reminder of the sound of the Lex Imperialis and the sight of Glaito's teeth."

"I will be the judge of who is a criminal in the eyes of the Adeptus Arbites. As for my presence here — that's just to give you a reminder of the sound of the Lex Imperialis and the sight of Glaito's teeth."

languages.text: “哪些人是法务部通缉的罪犯，哪些人不是，这些由我来决定。至于来这里的目的，我只是想提醒你一下：不要忘记帝国法典的条款，也不要忘记格雷托的尖牙。”
languages.original_text: "I will be the judge of who is a criminal in the eyes of the Adeptus Arbites. As for my presence here — that's just to give you a reminder of the sound of the Lex Imperialis and the sight of Glaito's teeth."

traits.locale_text: “哪些人是法务部通缉的罪犯，哪些人不是，这些由我来决定。至于来这里的目的，我只是想提醒你一下：不要忘记帝国法典的条款，也不要忘记格雷托的尖牙。”

languages.text: «Yo decidiré quién es un criminal a ojos del Adeptus Arbites. En cuanto a mi presencia aquí, es solo para recordarle el sonido de la Lex Imperialis y la imagen de los dientes de Glaito».
languages.original_text: "I will be the judge of who is a criminal in the eyes of the Adeptus Arbites. As for my presence here — that's just to give you a reminder of the sound of the Lex Imperialis and the sight of Glaito's teeth."

traits.locale_text: «Yo decidiré quién es un criminal a ojos del Adeptus Arbites. En cuanto a mi presencia aquí, es solo para recordarle el sonido de la Lex Imperialis y la imagen de los dientes de Glaito».

languages.text: « C'est à l'Adeptus Arbites, et donc à moi, qu'il revient de juger de l'importance des crimes. Quant à la raison de ma présence ici... Je souhaitais vous rappeler l'importance de la Lex Imperialis et vous montrer les crocs de Glaito. »
languages.original_text: "I will be the judge of who is a criminal in the eyes of the Adeptus Arbites. As for my presence here — that's just to give you a reminder of the sound of the Lex Imperialis and the sight of Glaito's teeth."

traits.locale_text: « C'est à l'Adeptus Arbites, et donc à moi, qu'il revient de juger de l'importance des crimes. Quant à la raison de ma présence ici... Je souhaitais vous rappeler l'importance de la Lex Imperialis et vous montrer les crocs de Glaito. »

languages.text: 「高等裁定局の目に誰が犯罪者であるかを判断するのは俺だ。俺がここにいる理由は、レックス・インペリアの響きとグライトの牙をお前に思い出させるために過ぎない」
languages.original_text: "I will be the judge of who is a criminal in the eyes of the Adeptus Arbites. As for my presence here — that's just to give you a reminder of the sound of the Lex Imperialis and the sight of Glaito's teeth."

traits.locale_text: 「高等裁定局の目に誰が犯罪者であるかを判断するのは俺だ。俺がここにいる理由は、レックス・インペリアの響きとグライトの牙をお前に思い出させるために過ぎない」

languages.text: "Adeptus Arbites'e göre kimin suçlu olup olmadığına ben karar veririm. Buraya gelmemin sebebi ise... Size Lex İmperialis'in sesini hatırlatmak ve Glaito'nun dişlerini göstermekti."
languages.original_text: "I will be the judge of who is a criminal in the eyes of the Adeptus Arbites. As for my presence here — that's just to give you a reminder of the sound of the Lex Imperialis and the sight of Glaito's teeth."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Arbites'e göre kimin suçlu olup olmadığına ben karar veririm. Buraya gelmemin sebebi ise... Size Lex Imperialis'in sesini hatırlatmak ve Glaito'nun dişlerini göstermekti."

languages.text: "Ich richte darüber, wer in den Augen der Adeptus Arbites ein Verbrecher ist. Und meine Anwesenheit hier ... soll Euch lediglich daran erinnern, wie das Lex Imperia klingt und die Zähne von Glaito aussehen."
languages.original_text: "I will be the judge of who is a criminal in the eyes of the Adeptus Arbites. As for my presence here — that's just to give you a reminder of the sound of the Lex Imperialis and the sight of Glaito's teeth."

traits.locale_text: "Ich richte darüber, wer in den Augen der Adeptus Arbites ein Verbrecher ist. Und meine Anwesenheit hier ... soll Euch lediglich daran erinnern, wie das Lex Imperia klingt und die Zähne von Glaito aussehen."
